summary: The United States Numbered Highways is a national system of roads in the United States.
full_text:
Van Horn is a town in and the county seat of Culberson County, Texas, United States. According to the 2010 census, Van Horn had a population of 2,063, down from 2,435 at the 2000 census.
^ "American FactFinder". United States Census Bureau. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "US Board on Geographic Names". United States Geological Survey. 2007-10-25. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "Find a County". National Association of Counties. Retrieved 2011-06-07. 
^ "Geographic Identifiers: 2010 Census Summary File 1 : Van Horn town, Texas". U.S. Census Bureau, American Factfinder. Retrieved August 6, 2015.
title: Van Horn, Texas
